Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days [M-F]. We provide tracking numbers for all our shipments. If you havde a speacial request, give us a call.

Items shipped via USPS Standard Mail should arrive within 4-14 business days [M-F]. Please note, as per USPS, depending on service location and/or high peak periods within the post office, deliveries can take up to 21 business days [M-F] to arrive.

Should your order not arrive within 21 business days [M-F], please contact us promptly for resolution.
